extendedInfo.description: USA Today - ââââ "The animated art style is gorgeous, the dialogue clever and funny, and strong mechanics rescue mobile players yearning for their next great game." Modojo - ââââ "It's something a little bit different, it's beautifully crafted, and unquestionably entertaining..." Gamezebo - ââââ "...when it looks this good, is written this intelligently, and plays with such ease, you'll have a hard time saying no." Macgasm "Game of the Week" One of Game Informer's "best games that 2012 has to offer" in their 2012 Holiday Buying Guide! Somewhere between GOOD and EVIL... Between ORDER and CHAOS... Between UPPER MANAGEMENT and the SENIOR STAFF... You'll find the glue that holds it all together: The Middle Manager of Justice! Congratulations, you are the new Middle Manager of Justice! You have been hired to whip the latest branch of Justice Corp. into shape! Train and manage your team of superheroes to thwart crime and save citizens around the city! Increase efficiency in your branch by building new facilities and upgrading the equipment! Could it be done without you? Yeah, probably. But it would be sloppy, costly and demotivating!

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This ia a really fun game with an excellent visual style. I would like the request gplay saves for cross platform gaming though.
reviews.author: Jamie Gray

reviews.title: Decent game but requires waiting or paying
reviews.comment: This is an interesting free to play game with you managing heroes. However actions take time so you can wait or use superium which you earn in missions or pay for. There is a lot of waiting if you pay without paying.
reviews.author: Franklin Morrison

reviews.title: Awesome sauce!
reviews.comment: This is a great fun free game to play and its nothing like I\'ve ever seen before. I can\'t wait for new updates with more heros... Love the game keep up with the good work
reviews.author: Logan Clark

reviews.title: FOR JUSTICE!!!
reviews.comment: Having a blast with the game.  1) More heroes in the base would rock. 2) This game is BATTERY HUNGRY! and makes my battery heat to some serious levels. 3) Collect all on cash & que\'ing of actions would rock.  KEEP IT UP  PS: Does this save to Gplay? If i download & play this on different devices does it keep my place?
reviews.author: Ben Carter

reviews.title: Frecuent hangs
reviews.comment: I\'m around 75% progress in the game, and it hangs for about 2 seconds and then resume. The issue is quite frecuent. My phone is a Galaxy S4 (GT-I9500), so hardware shouldn\'t be the issue.
reviews.author: Ignacio Nallar

reviews.title: Fantastic Game
reviews.comment: +Anyone can actually play this game and have fun without spending money.  -We can hire, how do we fire?  Above all, Great Game!
reviews.author: Jessie Burroughs

reviews.title: Fun Game
reviews.comment: I like how they handled the in-app purchases, never too pushy - and they make the game free with no ads. Bravo, I would love to see more games like this.
reviews.author: Aaron Peloquin

reviews.title: Tella me insufficient storage
reviews.comment: I have a 32 gb Xperia with no more than 10 small apps
reviews.author: Joseph Edward

reviews.title: Update fixed my problem.
reviews.comment: Thanks to the dev for answering my issue, worth 5 stars for that!
reviews.author: Samm Robins

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: You should have all your super heroes in your base and you should be aloud to make more rooms.
reviews.author: Ben Evans

reviews.title: What to do now??
reviews.comment: It\'s really fun. But what do I  do with all my money after I buy all the equipment and lvl up the manager to the max lvl? All up  grades are done. Can someone give me some hints? Help!!
reviews.author: winnie f

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: I started playing and I like the cartoon style but when I play the first mission it stop working and freeze and I\'ve nexus 7 so I hope it\'ll fix
reviews.author: Fadel Moon

reviews.title: Fantastic game
reviews.comment: This is a great game overall. I have put several hours into it and I\'m not bored. I can\'t say that about most games. Once you get to a certain point there really isn\'t much waiting unless you\'re upgrading your heroes\' stats. Besides, you don\'t need a constant internet connection unlike similar games.
reviews.author: A Jenk

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: Great concept and graphics. Being from a corporate setting one can appreciate this game even more :)
reviews.author: M. Payne Jr

reviews.title: Fun Game
reviews.comment: The IAPs are done the way it should be. You don\'t have to spend a ton of money to have fun with the game. I hope they add more content in future updates.
reviews.author: Jason Miller

reviews.title: Back button support is mysteriously absent.
reviews.comment: I\'m sick of hitting the back button (Android OS, I mean) and either not going to a previous page or quitting the app altogether.  I especially hate quitting the app on accident since there is not \"are you sure\" dialog box.
reviews.author: Marco Davis

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Loved the game. Maxed it all out without paying a dime! Just wish it was longer maybe more maps?
reviews.author: Juanita McBride

reviews.title: Fun but new and buggy
reviews.comment: Very fun game but please fix bug. I cant research snack and will never be able to and cause of that I can complete my othet goals. Please fix this bug.
reviews.author: Edmond Lee

reviews.title: Good, clean, polished, game
reviews.comment: I love the interface and attention to detail. Even though there are micro transactions available they have a good habit of not pushing it into your face. I really enjoy this game.
reviews.author: Devin Lamarca

reviews.title: Don\'t play the game with a low battery
reviews.comment: I\'ve found one bug.  If your battery dies mid game (ie. You are playing it or the game is just open) all your game data is lost.  I\'ve lost my game data 2 times this way.  Other than that, 5 star game.  Fix the bug.
reviews.author: Jeremy Martin
